meanings.definition: One who leads astray or gives incorrect directions.
meanings.sent1: The misguider intentionally led the hikers off the trail.
meanings.sent2: The lost tourists followed the misguider and ended up in the wrong part of town.
meanings.sent3: The misguider told the children that the library was actually a candy store!
meanings.sent4: The misguider's map was like a puzzle with all the wrong pieces.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the misguider who pretends to know the way but only confuses you.

meanings.definition: To lead or direct in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent1: The tricky signs misguidered the drivers onto the closed road.
meanings.sent2: The faulty GPS misguiders many travelers to dead ends.
meanings.sent3: The misguidered cat thought the fishbowl was the litter box!
meanings.sent4: His misleading advice misguidered her thoughts down a dangerous path.
meanings.sent5: The misguidered compass pointed south instead of north, causing confusion.
